article:
This is a sortable list of games on the Nintendo DS, DS Lite and DSi handheld
game consoles. With regards to working titles, the names are subject to change
as their release date approaches. According to Nintendo of America, there are
over 1150 DS games available as of February 12, 2011. This list
begins with the numbers 0â9, and later begins with the letter A and ends with
the letter I. This list does not include games released on Nintendo's DSiWare.
